name: Cielito Lindo
description:
Cielito Lindo is an adventure in which you will have to apply logic to overcome a bunch of levels full of characters from the underworld.

Death has gone on a spree in Mexico and has left the doors of purgatory open and filled with daemons. Now you have to expel all demons from purgatory. To do this you will have to make use of rocks, moving them conveniently, to pile them up or fill in gaps, break blocks of earth to open your way or transport yourself through doors, all while avoiding falling into a hole that will prevent you from finishing the level. Help Death to solve the challenges of getting rid of the daemons in each level.
